I sigh, getting on the bus. I've just bought my phone, as well as a phone plan for it. It's an IPhone 6 with unlimited talk and text at $40 a month, which to me seems like quite a deal, since I overall paid less than most would. As I look over the phone, I realize there's a fifth app on that little bar you see at the bottom of the phone's home screen. "Modify... I wonder what that does?" I say softly to myself, in the back of the bus, where very few people are. I tap the app, and watch as it loads up, greeting me with this intro message:
Welcome to Modify, the app for all your modification means! This has been long in development, since computers were created, really, and has been put onto one phone for the use of one lucky man or woman. It says your name is Jessica in the data of your phone. Hello, Jessica! This is a powerful app, and I hope that you will use it wisely.
If you use the camera, front or back, to take a picture of someone or yourself- no taking pictures of pictures!- you can use the very simple text menu to type any change, and it will happen. This may seem unbelievable, but once you've given it a try, I assure you, you'll believe it. The text menu is actually a notepad-looking menu, where all you need to do is type the change, then press confirm on the digital keyboard. Given a delay or a second or two, the changes will begin, and will be done 100% accurate.
I assume you can figure the rest out for yourself. Good luck, and don't let the power of this app go to your head. If this falls into the wrong hands, it will cause pain and terror once thought unimaginable...
-SJ and BG
By the time I'm done reading, I'm at my house, one of many on the road. I step out of the bus, and I head up to my front door. info.brief_description: When girl find an app that claims to be able to modify others, who will she use it on?
info.description:
"Modify" - An Interactive Story

By Mystewriter

Hello, and welcome to my story! I actually am basing this off of a story I read years ago on this website, but has since apparently been removed. The story, also interactive, was known as Body Swapper App at the time, though search results have shown nothing in finding it again. I used this as a roleplay idea for a while, up until now, when I can afford a 12-month membership here.
Now I can spead the joy of this story with everyone on Writing.com!
Better Description
When Jessica, a young woman just out of college, finds an app unique to her phone that claims to be able to modify those she takes a picture of, just who will she change, and will the power go to her head? That's, quite literally, your choice, though the real question may not be "will it go to her head", but instead, "how far will it go?"
There are, of course, some rules. And here they are!
1. As one is the most important, proper grammar, people! I respect your individual grammar skills, but try your best. I will do what i can to correct your grammar, but if it's too bad, I may have to delete the chapter.
2a. Keep it gradual. It's fine if alot of changes happen often, but keep plot and story to it. As well as this, don't just have constant sex scenes going on in the story.
2b. Failure to follow 2a will result in an immediate deletion of your chapter, no exceptions! Remember this. While this is true, large orgies/and long sex scenes are okay, as long as there's ample space between scenes. The roleplay is focused on expansion, plot development, etc., not sex, sex, and more sex.
3. PM me if you want me to add more official characters. Chances are, soon after writing this, I'll have also posted a character index, which, if i have, I will edit into here and leave that as this rule. Either way, when you introduce characters, PM me a description of them for me to add into the index. I will only do so if I can see that they will remain important to that plot in this interactive story, though.
4. No death when possible, but if it can't be avoided then I may make an exception.
5. Gore. Gore is something I'm off-and-on alright with. You may add it to your chapter, but use it sparingly. I will delete chapters with excessive gore, bodily fluids, and other things similar. Remember this when you're planning your elaborate blood and shitfest. *sarcasm*
If you have any other questions, PM me.
